tools.name: observe_omnizon
tools.title: Observe Omnizon
tools.description: Observes the current Omnizon page, returning page type, cart count, and selected product information.

selected_product.description: The currently selected product, if any; otherwise null.

cart_count.description: The number of items in the shopping cart.

current_tab.description: The currently selected tab, if any; otherwise null.

tools.is_ready: return document.querySelector('.MuiBox-root[aria-label="Shopping Cart"]') || document.querySelector('button[aria-label="Place your order"]') || document.body.textContent.includes('Order placed') ? true : [false, 'Page not fully loaded'];
tools.is_completed: return typeof output === 'object' && typeof output.page_type === 'string' && typeof output.cart_count === 'number';
tools.execute: let page_type = 'other'; const path = location.pathname; const bodyText = document.body.textContent; const h1 = document.querySelector('h1.MuiTypography-h1'); const selectedTab = document.querySelector('button[role="tab"][aria-selected="true"]'); const current_tab = selectedTab ? selectedTab.textContent.trim() : null; if (path === '/') page_type = 'home'; else if (document.querySelector('button[aria-label="Buy now"]') || document.querySelector('#product-details-header')) page_type = 'product'; else if (bodyText.includes('results for') || (document.querySelectorAll('h2[role="link"]').length > 3)) page_type = 'results'; else if (h1 && h1.textContent.includes('Your Orders') && document.querySelector('button[role="tab"]')) { if (current_tab === 'Buy Again') page_type = 'orders_buy_again'; else if (current_tab === 'Cancelled Orders') page_type = 'orders_cancelled'; else if (current_tab === 'Not Yet Shipped') page_type = 'orders_not_shipped'; else page_type = 'orders'; } else if (bodyText.includes('Checkout') && document.querySelector('button[aria-label="Place your order"]')) page_type = 'checkout'; else if (bodyText.includes('Write a Customer Review')) page_type = 'review'; else if ((h1 && h1.textContent.includes('Cancel Order')) || document.querySelector('#cancel-reason-label')) page_type = 'cancellation'; else if (bodyText.includes('Order placed') || bodyText.includes('Order confirmed')) page_type = 'order_confirmation'; const cartCountEl = document.querySelector('p[aria-label^="Cart has"]'); const cart_count = cartCountEl ? parseInt(cartCountEl.getAttribute('aria-label').match(/\d+/)?.[0] || '0', 10) : 0; const productName = document.querySelector('#product-details-header') || document.querySelector('h1'); const selected_product = page_type === 'product' && productName ? productName.textContent.trim() : null; return {page_type, selected_product, cart_count, current_tab};

tools.name: goto_home
tools.title: Goto Home
tools.description: Navigates to the Home page by clicking the Home button.
tools.is_ready: return document.querySelector("a[aria-label='Home']") ? true : [false, 'Home button not found'];
tools.is_completed: return typeof output === 'object' && window.location.pathname === '/' ? true : [false, 'Not navigated to home'];
tools.execute: document.querySelector("a[aria-label='Home']").click(); return {};

tools.name: goto_orders
tools.title: Goto Orders
tools.description: Navigates to the orders page (by default, lands on the 'Orders' tab).
tools.is_ready: const ordersLink = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('.MuiStack-root')).find(el => el.textContent.includes('Returns') && el.textContent.includes('Orders')); return ordersLink ? true : [false, 'Orders element not found'];
tools.is_completed: const h1 = document.querySelector('h1.MuiTypography-h1'); const hasTabs = document.querySelectorAll('button[role="tab"]').length > 0; return (h1 && h1.textContent.includes('Your Orders')) || hasTabs ? true : [false, 'Not navigated to orders page'];
tools.execute: const ordersLink = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('.MuiStack-root')).find(el => el.textContent.includes('Returns') && el.textContent.includes('Orders')); if (ordersLink) ordersLink.click(); return {};

tools.name: goto_cart
tools.title: Goto Cart
tools.description: Navigates to the shopping cart page.
tools.is_ready: return document.querySelector("div[aria-label='Shopping Cart']") ? true : [false, 'Cart button not found'];
tools.is_completed: return typeof output === 'object' && window.location.pathname.includes('cart') ? true : [false, 'Not navigated to cart'];
tools.execute: document.querySelector("div[aria-label='Shopping Cart']").click(); return {};

tools.name: goto_category
tools.title: Goto Category
tools.description: Navigates to the specified category by clicking on its name on the page.

categoryName.description: The name of the category to navigate to.

success.description: Whether navigation to the specified category was successful.

tools.is_ready: const categories = ['Gift', 'Toy', 'Home', 'Gaming', 'Cosmetic', 'Headphones', 'Coffee', 'Kitchen']; const items = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('p.MuiTypography-body1')).filter(p => categories.includes(p.textContent.trim())); return items.length > 0 ? true : [false, 'No categories in top menu'];
tools.is_completed: return document.body.textContent.includes('results for') || document.querySelectorAll('h2[role="link"]').length > 0 ? true : [false, 'Not on results page'];
tools.execute: const items = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('p.MuiTypography-body1')); const target = items.find(p => p.textContent.trim().toLowerCase() === inputs.categoryName.trim().toLowerCase()); if (target) { target.click(); return {success: true}; } return {success: false};

tools.name: goto_orders_tab
tools.title: Goto Orders Tab
tools.description: Switches to the 'Orders' tab on the orders page.
tools.is_ready: const tabs = document.querySelectorAll('button[role="tab"]'); return tabs.length > 0 ? true : [false, 'No order tabs found'];
tools.is_completed: const selectedTab = document.querySelector('button[role="tab"][aria-selected="true"]'); return selectedTab && selectedTab.textContent.trim() === 'Orders' ? true : [false, 'Orders tab not selected'];
tools.execute: const tabs = document.querySelectorAll('button[role="tab"]'); for (const tab of tabs) { if (tab.textContent.trim() === 'Orders') { tab.click(); break; } } return {};

tools.name: goto_buy_again_tab
tools.title: Goto Buy Again Tab
tools.description: Switches to the 'Buy Again' tab on the orders page.
tools.is_ready: const tabs = document.querySelectorAll('button[role="tab"]'); return tabs.length > 0 ? true : [false, 'No order tabs found'];
tools.is_completed: const selectedTab = document.querySelector('button[role="tab"][aria-selected="true"]'); return selectedTab && selectedTab.textContent.trim() === 'Buy Again' ? true : [false, 'Buy Again tab not selected'];
tools.execute: const tabs = document.querySelectorAll('button[role="tab"]'); for (const tab of tabs) { if (tab.textContent.trim() === 'Buy Again') { tab.click(); break; } } return {};

tools.name: goto_cancelled_orders_tab
tools.title: Goto Cancelled Orders Tab
tools.description: Switches to the 'Cancelled Orders' tab on the orders page.
tools.is_ready: const tabs = document.querySelectorAll('button[role="tab"]'); return tabs.length > 0 ? true : [false, 'No order tabs found'];
tools.is_completed: const selectedTab = document.querySelector('button[role="tab"][aria-selected="true"]'); return selectedTab && selectedTab.textContent.trim() === 'Cancelled Orders' ? true : [false, 'Cancelled Orders tab not selected'];
tools.execute: const tabs = document.querySelectorAll('button[role="tab"]'); for (const tab of tabs) { if (tab.textContent.trim() === 'Cancelled Orders') { tab.click(); break; } } return {};

tools.name: goto_not_yet_shipped_tab
tools.title: Goto Not Yet Shipped Tab
tools.description: Switches to the 'Not Yet Shipped' tab on the orders page.
tools.is_ready: const tabs = document.querySelectorAll('button[role="tab"]'); return tabs.length > 0 ? true : [false, 'No order tabs found'];
tools.is_completed: const selectedTab = document.querySelector('button[role="tab"][aria-selected="true"]'); return selectedTab && selectedTab.textContent.trim() === 'Not Yet Shipped' ? true : [false, 'Not Yet Shipped tab not selected'];
tools.execute: const tabs = document.querySelectorAll('button[role="tab"]'); for (const tab of tabs) { if (tab.textContent.trim() === 'Not Yet Shipped') { tab.click(); break; } } return {};

tools.name: list_orders
tools.title: List Orders
tools.description: Lists all orders visible on the current orders tab (Orders, Buy Again, Cancelled Orders, or Not Yet Shipped). Returns order number, total, date, status, and each item's name and price. Returns empty list if no orders on current tab.

items.description: List of orders on the current tab

total.description: The order total with currency symbol, e.g. '$332.89'

date.description: The order date in M/D/YYYY format, e.g. '7/18/2024'

status.description: Delivery status: expected arrival day (e.g. 'Tuesday'), 'Delivered on <date>', or 'Cancelled'

items.description: List of products in this order

price.description: The product price with currency symbol, e.g. '$32.99'

tools.is_ready: const h1 = document.querySelector('h1.MuiTypography-h1'); const hasTabs = document.querySelectorAll('button[role="tab"]').length > 0; return (h1 && h1.textContent.includes('Your Orders')) || hasTabs ? true : [false, 'Not on orders page'];
tools.is_completed: return Array.isArray(output.items) ? true : [false, 'Invalid output'];

tools.name: goto_cancel
tools.title: Goto Cancel
tools.description: Navigates to the cancellation page for a specified order.

order_index.description: The zero-based index of the order to open cancellation for.

order_number.description: The order number identifying which order to open cancellation for.

success.description: True if navigation to the cancellation page was successful.

tools.is_ready: const btns = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('button')).filter(btn => btn.textContent.trim()==='Cancel order'); return btns.length > 0 ? true : [false,'No Cancel order button'];
tools.is_completed: const h1 = document.querySelector('h1.MuiTypography-h1'); const hasReasonDropdown = document.querySelector('#cancel-reason-label'); return (h1 && h1.textContent.includes('Cancel Order')) || hasReasonDropdown ? true : [false,'Not on cancellation page'];

tools.name: cancel_order
tools.title: Cancel Order
tools.description: Confirms and submits the order cancellation on the cancellation page.
tools.is_ready: return Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('button')).some(el => el.textContent.trim().toLowerCase().includes('cancel order')) ? true : [false, 'Cancel Order button not found'];
tools.is_completed: const h1 = document.querySelector('h1.MuiTypography-h1'); const hasTabs = document.querySelectorAll('button[role="tab"]').length > 0; return (h1 && h1.textContent.includes('Your Orders')) || hasTabs ? true : [false, 'Not back on orders page'];
tools.execute: const btn = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('button')).find(el => el.textContent.trim().toLowerCase().includes('cancel order')); if(btn){btn.click(); for(let i=0;i<20;i++){await new Promise(r=>setTimeout(r,250)); if(document.body.textContent.includes('Cancellation Confirmed')){break;}} await new Promise(r=>setTimeout(r,500)); const ordersLink = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('p')).find(p=>p.textContent.includes('See my orders')); if(ordersLink){ordersLink.click();} return {success:true};} return {success:false};

tools.name: goto_write_review
tools.title: Goto Write Review
tools.description: Navigates to the review page for a specified product. Only works on the 'Orders' tab where 'Write a product review' buttons are available (not on 'Buy Again' or other tabs).

product_name.description: The name (or part of the name) of the product to select for writing a review.

product_index.description: The zero-based index of the product to select for writing a review.

success.description: True if navigation and button click succeeded, false otherwise.

selected_product.description: The name of the selected product, if successful.

error.description: Error message if navigation failed or product not found.

tools.is_ready: const reviewBtns = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('button')).filter(btn => btn.textContent.includes('Write a product review')); return reviewBtns.length > 0 ? true : [false, 'No review buttons found'];
tools.is_completed: return document.body.textContent.includes('Write a Customer Review') || document.body.textContent.includes('Overall Rating') ? true : [false, 'Not navigated to review page'];

tools.name: set_review_rating
tools.title: Set Review Rating
tools.description: Sets the review rating by clicking the corresponding radio button on the page.

rating.description: The numeric value of the rating to set (e.g., 1 to 5).

tools.is_ready: const radios = document.querySelectorAll('.MuiRating-root input[type="radio"]'); return radios.length >= 5 ? true : [false, 'Rating radio buttons not found'];
tools.is_completed: const checked = document.querySelector('.MuiRating-root input[type="radio"]:checked'); return checked && checked.value == String(inputs.rating) ? true : [false, 'Rating not selected correctly'];
tools.execute: const rating = Number(inputs.rating); const radios = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('.MuiRating-root input[type="radio"]')); const target = radios.find(r => r.value == rating); if(target) { target.click(); return {success:true}; } else { return {success:false}; }

tools.name: fill_review
tools.title: Fill Review
tools.description: Fills in the review form fields with the provided title and content.

title.description: The title of the review to fill into the form.

content.description: The content or experience details to fill into the review form.

success.description: Indicates whether both the title and content fields were found and filled successfully.

tools.is_ready: const titleInput = document.querySelector('input[placeholder*="title"]'); const contentTextarea = document.querySelector('textarea[placeholder*="experience"]'); return (titleInput && contentTextarea) ? true : [false, 'Title or content field not found'];
tools.is_completed: const titleInput = document.querySelector('input[placeholder*="title"]'); const contentTextarea = document.querySelector('textarea[placeholder*="experience"]'); return (titleInput && titleInput.value === inputs.title && contentTextarea && contentTextarea.value === inputs.content) ? true : [false, 'Fields not filled correctly'];
tools.execute: const titleInput = document.querySelector('input[placeholder*="title"]'); const contentTextarea = document.querySelector('textarea[placeholder*="experience"]'); const inputSetter = Object.getOwnPropertyDescriptor(window.HTMLInputElement.prototype, 'value').set; const textareaSetter = Object.getOwnPropertyDescriptor(window.HTMLTextAreaElement.prototype, 'value').set; if (titleInput) { inputSetter.call(titleInput, inputs.title || ''); titleInput.dispatchEvent(new Event('input', {bubbles: true})); } if (contentTextarea) { textareaSetter.call(contentTextarea, inputs.content || ''); contentTextarea.dispatchEvent(new Event('input', {bubbles: true})); } return {success: !!(titleInput && contentTextarea)};

tools.name: submit_review
tools.title: Submit Review
tools.description: Clicks the 'Submit Review' button.
tools.is_ready: const btn = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('button')).find(el => el.textContent.trim().toLowerCase().includes('submit review')); return btn ? true : [false, 'Submit Review button not found'];
tools.is_completed: const h1 = document.querySelector('h1.MuiTypography-h1'); const hasTabs = document.querySelectorAll('button[role="tab"]').length > 0; return (h1 && h1.textContent.includes('Your Orders')) || hasTabs ? true : [false, 'Not navigated to orders page'];
tools.execute: const btn = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('button')).find(el => el.textContent.trim().toLowerCase().includes('submit review')); if(btn){btn.click(); const interval = setInterval(() => { const onProductPage = document.querySelector('#product-details-header') || document.querySelector('button[aria-label="Buy now"]'); if (onProductPage) { clearInterval(interval); const ordersLink = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('.MuiStack-root')).find(el => el.textContent.includes('Returns') && el.textContent.includes('Orders')); if (ordersLink) ordersLink.click(); } }, 200); return {success:true};} return {success:false};

tools.name: search_products
tools.title: Search Products
tools.description: Searches for products by entering the given query into the visible search bar and clicking the search button.

query.description: The search term to use for finding products, e.g., chair

success.description: Whether the search action was successfully performed.

error.description: Error message if the search bar was not found.

tools.is_ready: const inputsArr = document.querySelectorAll('input.MuiInputBase-input.MuiOutlinedInput-input.css-1pk1fka'); const btnsArr = document.querySelectorAll('button[aria-label="Search"]'); let found=false; for(let i=0;i<inputsArr.length;i++){ if(inputsArr[i].offsetParent!==null && btnsArr[i].offsetParent!==null){found=true;break;} } return found ? true : [false,'Visible search bar/button not found'];
tools.is_completed: return document.body.innerText.includes('results') || window.location.href.includes('results') || document.querySelectorAll('h2[role="link"]').length>0 ? true : [false,'Results page not detected'];

tools.name: list_results
tools.title: List Results
tools.description: Lists product items on the search results page, extracting their name, price, and brand. Returns empty list if no products found.
tools.is_ready: return document.body.textContent.includes('results for') || window.location.href.includes('results') ? true : [false,'Not on results page'];
tools.is_completed: return Array.isArray(output.items) ? true : [false,'Invalid output'];

tools.name: goto_product
tools.title: Goto Product
tools.description: Navigates to the product details page for the specified product name.

productName.description: The name of the product to navigate to.

tools.is_ready: const cards = document.querySelectorAll('h2[role="link"]'); return cards.length > 0 ? true : [false, 'No product cards found on page'];
tools.is_completed: if (output.success === false) return true; const header = document.querySelector('#product-details-header') || document.querySelector('button[aria-label="Buy now"]'); return header ? true : [false, 'Did not navigate to product detail page'];
tools.execute: const query = inputs.productName.toLowerCase(); const h2s = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('h2[role="link"]')); const match = h2s.find(h2 => { const container = h2.closest('.MuiGrid2-root'); const title = h2.textContent.trim().toLowerCase(); if (title.includes(query)) return true; const brandEl = container?.querySelector('p.MuiTypography-body1'); const brand = brandEl?.textContent.trim().toLowerCase() || ''; if (brand.includes(query)) return true; const ariaLabel = container?.querySelector('[aria-label^="View details"]')?.getAttribute('aria-label')?.toLowerCase() || ''; return ariaLabel.includes(query); }); if (match) match.click(); return {success: !!match};

tools.name: get_product_details
tools.title: Get Product Details
tools.description: Retrieves detailed information about a product, including name, price, color, description, max_quantity (maximum orderable quantity), rating, and attributes.

max_quantity.description: Maximum orderable quantity for this product (e.g., 30)

attributes.description: Product attributes like Brand, Special Feature, Material, etc.

tools.is_ready: return document.querySelector('#product-details-header') || document.querySelector('button[aria-label="Buy now"]') ? true : [false, 'Product page not loaded'];
tools.is_completed: return output && typeof output.name === 'string' && output.name.length > 0 ? true : [false, 'Product details not extracted'];

tools.name: set_quantity
tools.title: Set Quantity
tools.description: Sets the desired quantity by selecting the corresponding option in the quantity dropdown on the product page.

quantity.description: The desired quantity value to select (e.g. 1, 2, 3, etc.)

tools.is_ready: return document.querySelector("div[role='combobox'][id='quantity-select']") ? true : [false, 'Quantity combobox not loaded'];
tools.is_completed: const combobox = document.querySelector("div[role='combobox'][id='quantity-select']"); if (!combobox) return [false, 'Quantity combobox missing']; const val = combobox.textContent.match(/\d+/); return val && parseInt(val[0],10) === inputs.quantity ? true : [false, `Quantity not set to ${inputs.quantity}`];
tools.execute: const combobox = document.querySelector("div[role='combobox'][id='quantity-select']"); if (!combobox) return {success: false, error: 'Quantity combobox not found'}; combobox.dispatchEvent(new MouseEvent('mousedown', {bubbles: true, cancelable: true, view: window})); let options = []; for (let i = 0; i < 20; i++) { await new Promise(r => setTimeout(r, 100)); options = document.querySelectorAll('li[role="option"], [role="listbox"] [role="option"], ul[role="listbox"] li'); if (options.length > 0) break; } if (!options.length) return {success: false, error: 'No quantity options found in dropdown after waiting'}; const availableQtys = []; for (const opt of options) { const m = opt.textContent.match(/\d+/); if (m) availableQtys.push(parseInt(m[0], 10)); } const targetOpt = Array.from(options).find(opt => { const m = opt.textContent.match(/\d+/); return m && parseInt(m[0], 10) === inputs.quantity; }); if (targetOpt) { targetOpt.click(); return {success: true}; } return {success: false, error: `Quantity ${inputs.quantity} not available`, available_quantities: availableQtys};

tools.name: buy_now
tools.title: Buy Now
tools.description: Clicks the 'Buy now' button on the page if it exists.

success.description: Indicates if the 'Buy now' button was found and clicked.

error.description: Error message if the button was not found.

tools.is_ready: return document.querySelector('button[aria-label="Buy now"]') ? true : [false, 'Buy now button not found'];
tools.is_completed: const hasCheckout = document.body.textContent.includes('Checkout') && document.querySelector('button[aria-label="Place your order"]'); const notOnProduct = !document.querySelector('button[aria-label="Buy now"]'); return hasCheckout && notOnProduct ? true : [false, 'Did not reach checkout page'];
tools.execute: const btn = document.querySelector('button[aria-label="Buy now"]'); if (btn) { btn.click(); return {success: true}; } else { return {success: false, error: 'Buy now button not found'}; }

tools.name: add_to_cart
tools.title: Add To Cart
tools.description: Clicks the 'Add to cart' button on the page and returns the updated cart item count.

cart_count.description: The current number of items in the cart after adding.

tools.is_ready: return document.querySelector('button[aria-label="Add to cart"]') ? true : [false, 'Add to Cart button not found'];
tools.is_completed: const cartCountEl = document.querySelector('p[aria-label^="Cart has"]'); return cartCountEl ? true : [false, 'Cart count not updated'];
tools.execute: const btn = document.querySelector('button[aria-label="Add to cart"]'); if(btn) btn.click(); const cartCountEl = document.querySelector('p[aria-label^="Cart has"]'); const cart_count = cartCountEl ? parseInt(cartCountEl.getAttribute('aria-label').match(/\d+/)?.[0] || '0', 10) : 0; return {cart_count};

tools.name: get_checkout_details
tools.title: Get Checkout Details
tools.description: Extracts checkout details including cart items, delivery options, and order total from the current page.
tools.is_ready: return document.querySelector('button[aria-label="Place your order"]') ? true : [false,'Checkout not loaded'];
tools.is_completed: return typeof output === 'object' && Array.isArray(output.items) && Array.isArray(output.delivery_options);

tools.name: select_delivery_option
tools.title: Select Delivery Option
tools.description: Selects a delivery option on the page by index or by matching date text.

option_index.description: The zero-based index of the delivery option to select. Negative values count from the end.

date_text.description: A substring of the delivery date to match and select the corresponding option.

tools.is_ready: const options = document.querySelectorAll('label[aria-label*="delivery option"]'); return options.length > 0 ? true : [false, 'No delivery options found'];
tools.is_completed: const checked = document.querySelector('label[aria-label*="delivery option"] input[type=radio]:checked'); return checked ? true : [false, 'No delivery option selected'];

tools.name: place_order
tools.title: Place Order
tools.description: Clicks the 'Place your order' button on the page and reports whether the action was successful.
tools.is_ready: return document.querySelector('button[aria-label="Place your order"]') ? true : [false, 'Place your order button not found'];
tools.is_completed: return document.body.textContent.includes('Order placed') || document.body.textContent.includes('Order confirmed') ? true : [false, 'Order confirmation not detected'];
tools.execute: const btn = document.querySelector('button[aria-label="Place your order"]'); if (btn) { btn.click(); return {success: true}; } return {success: false};
